John Arrowwood wrote:

>Hey, all!
>
>My distributed NEAT experiment is up and running!  I've got 7 computers 
>conscripted into participating (so far), and it seems to be working well.  
>The experiment status page sucks, but it's better than nothing.  Not MUCH 
>better, but...
>  
>
Hi John,

It just so happens I have a spare Linux box under my desk - what are the 
chances of that? :)  It's only a pentiumII 266 though.

Anyway I got it running your experiment with no problems. Should I just 
leave it running for a while? It's not going to cause a problem if you 
decide to restart the experiment is it?

Colin.
